What are your opening hours?: We are open from 9 AM to 9 PM every day.
Where are you located?: We are located at 123 Main Street, Cityville.
Do you offer home delivery?: Yes, we provide free home delivery within 10 km.
How can I contact customer support?: You can reach us at support@example.com or call +91-9876543210.
What payment methods do you accept?: We accept credit/debit cards, UPI, and cash on delivery.
